thumb.title: Dr. Chris Sakowski, MD | Ankle Replacement Surgeon
thumb.description: As a premier center for ankle care, we’re pleased to provide comprehensive surgical and treatment services to patients suffering from severe ankle arthritis or other debilitating ankle conditions. Our leading Dallas ankle replacement surgeon is an expert in this complex procedure, offering the highest standard of care using state-of-the-art surgical techniques and technology.Dr. Chris Sakowski, MD | Ankle Replacement Surgeon7115 Greenville Ave #310, Dallas, TX 75231(214) 265-3200https://dallasfootanklesurgeon.com/ankle-doctor/ankle-replacement-surgeon/
